entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023
